markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bane Ammunition](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1895)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 42 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Monster hunters favor bane ammunition that contains a capsule of reagents tailored to a particular type of creature— [aberration](/Traits.aspx?ID=1), [animal](/Traits.aspx?ID=9), [beast](/Traits.aspx?ID=20), [dragon](/Traits.aspx?ID=50), [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69), [giant](/Traits.aspx?ID=79), [ooze](/Traits.aspx?ID=122), or both [fungus](/Traits.aspx?ID=77) and [plant](/Traits.aspx?ID=125). Each type requires a different formula. When activated bane ammunition hits a target that has a trait matching the selected type, it takes [persistent poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) in addition to the damage the attack normally deals.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Bane Ammunition (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 42 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ammunition deals 1d4 persistent poison damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Bane Ammunition (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 42 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ammunition deals 2d6 persistent poison damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Bane Ammunition (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 42 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ammunition deals 3d6 persistent poison damage.
name: Bane Ammunition (Lesser)
